solutions:
# YOUR CODE HERE
n, m = map(int, input().split())
hands = list(map(int, input().split()))

remaining_disinfectant = m
count = 0

for i in range(n):
    if remaining_disinfectant >= hands[i]:
        remaining_disinfectant -= hands[i]
        count += 1
    else:
        break

print(count)
